documentation.text:
@title ConsentBasic
 @notice Baseline GDPR helper contract with straightforward storage. Designed for benchmarking gas usage.

@title ConsentMinimalEvent
 @notice Minimal on-chain storage; uses events as the primary log for operations.

@title ConsentOptimized
 @notice Uses packed storage and batch operations to reduce gas.
